Perform shoulder mobility exercises like arm circles and wall slides.
Use resistance bands for hip mobility drills to prevent stiffness.
Incorporate ankle mobility stretches to improve squat depth and form.
Do thoracic spine rotations to enhance upper body flexibility.
Include controlled joint rotations to improve overall mobility and prevent injuries.
